data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - The Blackheart Power Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Blackheart Power Music Pack features 18 instrumental tracks from Kain Vinosec that will give your game a unique touch of darkness. Feel the intensity, and let the shadows take over...

This Music Pack Contains

  • 18 instrumental tracks.
  • Looped OGG Vorbis files for RPG Maker VX/Ace and WAVs for IG Maker.
  • The MP3 version of the tracks are included as a bonus.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.
  • A bonus Gothic Tiles Add-On from Lunarea.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
